note: No literal image paths found to optimize. All images in the codebase use variables (e.g., src={qrCode}, src={person.avatarUrl}) rather than literal strings like src='image.png'. This is actually a good React practice but means we can't auto-detect image dimensions at build time.

recommendations: Consider adding width/height attributes manually where known
Use CSS aspect-ratio for consistent layouts
Implement image dimension caching for dynamic images
